short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search up your faveourite users and join them!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this plugin to search for your favourite users within any game!

How to use:
- Make sure that the user you're attempting to join is in the same game you're searching.
- Press Search and that is all.

Please do not ask to update for searching for where a player is, it's not possible.
